channel.title: 704 Client Login Screen
channel.description:
I have the Optimus 704 Client.
When you go to log in, it has the Real Runescape Login Screen, with the "Connect to Facebook" logo and the "Create account here" stuff.
How can I take that off and just leave the "Username" and "Password" and "Login" boxes?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hwcei.png[/img]

item.title: 704 Client Login Screen
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You would have to edit the interface data.

As far as I know, nobody has made any strides with this in recent revisions.

Read full topic
